title: Create or Update Person
description: Update a person in Pipedrive or create them if they don't exist yet.

identifier.title: Person ID
identifier.description: Identifier used to find existing person in Pipedrive. Can be an email, name, phone number, or custom field value. Custom person fields may be included by using the long hash keys of the custom fields. These look like "33595c732cd7a027c458ea115a48a7f8a254fa86".

org_id.title: Organization ID
org_id.description: ID of the organization this person will belong to.

add_time.title: Created At
add_time.description: If the person is created, use this timestamp as the creation timestamp. Format: YYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS
